name: Worlde Lande Countrie
storyline:
One night at the pub, the most terrible thing happened to Mr. Geeza. He was called....
a PLONKER!!!
"Who would do such a thing?!", you might be asking? A despicable little bloke named "Quingale"!
With Qwargelo as his new arch-nemesis, Mr. Geeza plans to get his revenge, by ruining Quinging's cereal with Hot Sauce!
But little does Mr. Geeza know, that something strange is brewing in that pub....
summary: World Lande Countrie is a 2D platformer game about strange-looking blokes doing strange things.
